data.name: The Ultimate Clicker Master of the Universe - Deluxe Edition
data.detailed_description:
Special Bonus:

- Shows your Name in golden letters over everyones rune stone if you are the Clicker Master (and you will be the Clicker Master, I know it!)

- Special Bonus Item for your Inventory

- a special one time drop of 5 random runes

- Better idle-mode. The Penguin is checking if new Runes are available from the old gods. No need to click the rune stone more then necessary!

- You love pay to win? Me to! This DLC will let you start with 1 bonus Click! (Maybe the click which makes the difference? - Maybe!)

- Access to the special Deluxe Discord Group. Know everything about comming updates, rule-changes and server-resets hours before the normal players

- Support your loved Developer

data.short_description: Show everyone that you are a real Hardcore-Clicker-Master. With the unique Deluxe-Items and Cosmetics beeing Clicker Master is more gloriously than it ever was!

fullgame.name: The Ultimate Clicker Master of the Universe

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP up to Windows 10
  • Processor: T5500 1,66 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon X1300
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
